desc: 100% Organic Whole Plant Ingredients. Natural Medicine, Aromatherapy, Distillation, Skincare and Herbal Tinctures / Extracts. Handmade in small batches at our Distillery in Daylesford, Australia.

layout.text: In honour of the sacred ritual that is skin care, we have journeyed to its roots of the aristocracy in ancient Egypt. Found to have combined hydrosol (botanical infused water) and oil on their skin, this natural approach to creating the lotion as you apply it is free from emulsifying chemicals. Our ingredients are grown organically, bio-dynamically and wild harvested by us and our network of herbalists.
